localization_data.ERROR_MSG_ADMIN:
You need to launch app with admin rights!
Press any key to continue...
localization_data.ERROR_MSG_SSH: Unable to connect to port 22 on {host}
localization_data.INFO_MSG_UPDATE: Version {version} available, execute hostscli --update for update
localization_data.HELP_MSG:
Usage: hostscli [ACTION] [SOURCE] [TARGETS...]
Some examples:
APPEND: hostscli add 127.0.0.1 somesite.com
EDIT:   hostscli edit from 127.0.0.1 somesite.com to 127.0.0.1 anysite.com
REMOVE: hostscli rm 127.0.0.1 anysite.com
localization_data.HELP_MSG_ADD:
Usage: hostscli APPEND [SOURCE] [TARGETS...]
Example: hostscli add 127.0.0.1 somesite.com
localization_data.HELP_MSG_CONFIG:
Usage: hostscli CONFIG [PARAM]
Example: hostscli CONFIG --add
localization_data.HELP_MSG_EDIT:
Usage: hostscli edit [SOURCE] [TARGETS...]
Example: hostscli edit from 127.0.0.1 somesite.com to 127.0.0.1 anysite.com
localization_data.HELP_MSG_REMOVE:
Usage: hostscli rm [SOURCE] [TARGETS...]
Example: hostscli rm 127.0.0.1 somesite.com
localization_data.QST_MSG_REMOVE: Are you sure you want to remove object "{source} {targets}" on host(s) {hosts}? (y/n)
